newsitem.title: MEXICO: Ceramic share offer price 9.24 pesos.
newsitem.headline: Ceramic share offer price 9.24 pesos.

text.p: Mexican ceramic manufacturer and marketing company Internacional de Ceramica (Ceramic) fixed the offer price for its ongoing share subscription at 9.24 pesos, a company spokeswoman said on Wednesday.
The price will apply for the firm's UB and ULD shares and the deadline for subscription is noon on Thursday.
For each existing UB shareholding certificate, holders will be able to subscribe 0.1249383 new UB titles, and 0.1010041 new ULD titles, she said.
Ceramic is listed on the bolsa with compound share titles. Each UB title comprises two B class shares and each ULD is made up of an L and a D share.
Holders of ULD shares will be able to subscribe 0.2259424 new shares, she added.
Ceramic has offered a total of 3,301,000 UB shares and 6,699,000 ULD shares.
The offer, if fully subscribed, would increase the number of outstanding shares by 22.6 percent to 54,259,069, from 44,259,069.
The spokeswoman estimated that a fully subscribed offer would derive $11 million for the company which would be channelled into paying short-term debt.
